item.title: CK Hutchison Profit Plunges 92% on One-Off Loss From Merger
item.description: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s profit fell 92% in the first half of the year, due to a one-time and non-cash loss from the merger of its telecommunications arm with Vodafone Group Plc.

item.title: CK Hutchison Profit Plunges 92% on One-Off Loss From Merger
item.description: CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s profit fell 92% in the first half of the year, due to a one-time and non-cash loss from the merger of its telecommunications arm with Vodafone Group Plc.
